description:
A list of nominations of individuals or groups that applied for the Front Yards in Bloom program.
Front Yards in Bloom is a partnership of the Edmonton Horticultural Society, the Canadian Union of Postal Workers, and the City of Edmonton.

metadata.attribution: City of Edmonton, Edmonton Horticultural Society
